s1.ptxt: Remove main shaft bearing circlip using snap ring pliers.
Remove main shaft bearing (1) from main shaft (2) using bearing puller and hydraulic press.

Remove circlip (1) using snap ring pliers (2) and then pull out high speed synchronizer sleeve (5) from high speed synchronizer hub gradually with holding down synchronizer key (3) in order to prevent synchronizer keys and springs (4) from jumping out.

Remove high speed synchronizer hub (1), 3rd gear synchronizer ring assembly (2), 3rd gear (3), 3rd gear needle bearing, 3rd gear bush and 2nd gear (4) from main shaft (5) using special tool, bearing puller and hydraulic press.
Remove 2nd gear needle bearing and 2nd gear synchronizer ring assembly.

Remove circlip (1) using snap ring pliers (2) and then pull out low speed synchronizer sleeve (3) from low speed synchronizer hub gradually with holding down synchronizer key in order to prevent synchronizer keys (4) and synchronizer key springs (5) from jumped out.
Remove low speed synchronizer hub (1), 1st gear synchronizer ring assembly (2) and 1st gear (3) using bearing puller and hydraulic press, and then 1st gear needle bearing.
Remove 5th gear, synchronizer ring and needle bearing.

Remove circlip (1) using snap ring pliers (2) and then pull out 5th & reverse synchronizer sleeve (3) from 5th & reverse synchronizer hub gradually with holding down synchronizer key in order to prevent synchronizer keys and springs from jumped out.
Remove reverse gear (1), reverse gear synchronizer ring and 5th & reverse synchronizer hub (2) using bearing puller and hydraulic press, and then reverse gear needle bearing.
